fields.name: ad_target
fields.label: Ad Target
fields.description: The URL that will be launched when ad is clicked

fields.name: ad_size
fields.label: Ad Size
fields.description: The size of ads

fields.name: thumbnail
fields.label: Thumbnail
fields.description: The ads image

fields.name: expiry_date
fields.label: Expiry Date
fields.description: The day this ad will be expired, won't show in the app

fields.name: main_tab_name
fields.label: Main Tab Name
fields.description: The main home page tab name, by default it is "Trending"
fields.text_allowed_html_tags: strong em a ul ol li b i

fields.name: blocked_categories
fields.label: Blocked Categories
fields.description: The Categories you don't want to show name (Posts may still appear)

fields.name: featured_posts
fields.label: Featured Posts
fields.description: The main featured posts you want to show to the user, if none is selected, then the app will show the trending posts based on the algorithm what users are viewing most

fields.name: automatic_post_slide
fields.label: Automatic Post Slide
fields.description: If the slider in home page should be automatic

fields.name: show_top_logo
fields.label: Show Top Logo
fields.description: Enable/Disable Top Logo on homepage

fields.name: privacy_policy
fields.label: Privacy Policy
fields.description: Link of the privacy policy page

fields.name: terms_conditions
fields.label: Terms & Conditions
fields.description: Link of terms & conditions
fields.text_allowed_html_tags: strong em a ul ol li b i

fields.name: cookie_consent_text
fields.label: Cookie Consent Text
fields.description: The cookie consent text that will be showed to user
fields.default_value: We use cookies within our app to enhance your experience, but we want to make it clear that we do not track or collect any personal information about our users. Your privacy is important to us, and we are committed to providing a secure and enjoyable app experience without compromising your data.
fields.paragraph_allowed_html_tags: strong em a ul ol li b i

fields.name: show_cookie_consent
fields.label: Show Cookie Consent
fields.description: Show cookie consent to the user?

fields.name: about_page
fields.label: About Page
fields.description: The link of your about page

fields.name: facebook_link
fields.label: Facebook Link
fields.description: This will be shown in the setting page

fields.name: twitter_link
fields.label: Twitter Link
fields.description: This will be shown in the setting page

fields.name: telegram_link
fields.label: Telegram Link
fields.description: This will be shown in the setting page

fields.name: instagram_link
fields.label: Instagram Link
fields.description: This will be shown in the setting page

fields.name: tiktok_link
fields.label: Tiktok Link
fields.description: This will be shown in the setting page

fields.name: whatsapp_link
fields.label: Whatsapp link
fields.description: This will be shown in the setting page

fields.name: youtube_link
fields.label: Youtube Link
fields.description: Link of your youtube channel

fields.name: appstore_id
fields.label: Appstore ID
fields.description: The helps find the appstore app that will be used for rating the appstore
fields.text_allowed_html_tags: strong em a ul ol li b i

fields.name: app_download_link
fields.label: App Download Link
fields.description: This is shown when user share your app from the settings page, you can add your landing page here
fields.text_allowed_html_tags: strong em a ul ol li b i

fields.name: owner_email
fields.label: Owner Email
fields.description: App owner email or the company email (For Playstore)

fields.name: owner_name
fields.label: Owner Name
fields.description: Name of the app owner or company name
fields.text_allowed_html_tags: strong em a ul ol li b i

fields.name: owner_phone
fields.label: Owner Phone
fields.description: Phone number of the owner or company
fields.text_allowed_html_tags: strong em a ul ol li b i

fields.name: owner_address
fields.label: Owner Address
fields.description: Owner address or company address
fields.text_allowed_html_tags: strong em a ul ol li b i

fields.name: app_description
fields.label: App Description
fields.description: The description of your app
fields.text_allowed_html_tags: strong em a ul ol li b i

fields.name: report_email
fields.label: Report Email
fields.description: If you want to set additional email for getting reports, if left empty the owner email will be used

fields.name: googlemob_ads_status
fields.label: Googlemob Ads Status
fields.description: The status of your google admobs ads, is it enabled?

fields.name: custom_ads_status
fields.label: Custom Ads Status
fields.description: The status of your custom ads, is it enabled?

fields.name: interstitial_ad_count
fields.label: Interstitial Ad Count
fields.description: How many post after you wanna display custom or site ads in CategoryView

fields.name: posts_after_ads
fields.label: Posts After Ads
fields.description: How many post after you wanna display ads [HomePage] or [FeatureTab]

fields.name: posts_after_custom_ads
fields.label: Posts After Custom Ads
fields.description: How many post after you wanna display Custom Ads (You can display both)

fields.name: showadonlyfromthisnetwork
fields.label: Show Ad Only From
fields.description: You can assign only a single ad network to display ad from, if none is selected then it will be random
fields.pick_custom:
admob | Admob
facebook | Facebook
unity | Unity
applovin | AppLovin

fields.name: show_date_in_app
fields.label: Show Date in app
fields.description: If we should show date in app

fields.name: show_author
fields.label: Show Author
fields.description: Should the author page visible in the post details page

fields.name: show_trending_popular_icon
fields.label: Show trending/popular icon
fields.description: The icon for if the posts is popular or not

fields.name: show_comment
fields.label: Show Comment
fields.description: If the comment section is enabled or not

fields.name: show_view_on_website_button
fields.label: Show View on website button
fields.description: If the view on website button is visible

fields.name: show_report_button
fields.label: Show report button
fields.description: If the report button should be visible

fields.name: social_login
fields.label: Social Login
fields.description: Google & Apple Login(Only for iOS & Configurations required)

fields.name: login
fields.label: Login
fields.description: Enable/Disable User Login (Comment page will be disabled if selected No)

fields.name: onboarding_enabled
fields.label: Onboarding Enabled
fields.description: Enable/Disable Onboarding, if disabled user will land on Login Intro screen first

fields.name: multi_language
fields.label: Multi Language
fields.description: If you want multi language in the app (If disabled, English will be the default language)

fields.name: show_authors_in_explore_page
fields.label: Show Authors In Explore Page
fields.description: Show authors in explore page?

fields.name: show_post_views
fields.label: Show Post Views
fields.description: Show post views in the article or details page

fields.name: featured_video
fields.label: Featured Video
fields.description: If your post has a featured video, add it here

fields.name: extra_images
fields.label: Extra Images
fields.description: Any other extra images to show inside the featured image slide

fields.name: featured_youtube_video_url
fields.label: Featured Youtube Video Url
fields.description: If you want to add a youtube video, you can add it here

fields.name: saved_articles
fields.label: Saved Articles
fields.description: Favourite Article list
